section.section: The State Board shall prepare a summary of the election law that relates to campaign finance activity and provide for distribution of the summary.

When a certificate of candidacy is filed, the board receiving the certificate shall provide the candidate with:
a copy of the summary; and
each form the candidate is required to file under this title.

text.section: The State Board shall provide to a local board samples of such of the forms required under this title as the local board may request.
